phrases: jou jou yuu jou ban jin ma ji kai chou
ki mi wa best best friend
(furai!) cho tto fu za ke te mi ta ra
(faito!) ke n ka shi cha tta to ki mo
sa su ga sai kou friend
wa ke wa ka nnai nai
jou jou yuu jou ban jin ma ji kai chou
cha cha la cha la cha cha
You are my best, best friend!
When I joke around a bit,
You joke around more in response.
Being together 24 hours a day is not a problem.
Just like twins, or a parent and child, or clone cyborgs.
Then is not there no reason to clear your eyes?
Those are completely, completely different issues.
Even when I get in a fight with you,
(Down!) even when I get really down,
(Shy!) even when I feel like I want to be alone,
before I realise it, you are right there; we will be together even in death!
I want to be with you.
It is fun, is not it?
As expected of my best friend!
And then yo de le hi hoo!
I do not get it at all!
It is better than I imagined, the absolute best!
Even if I say this and that, we are still friends.
Cha Cha La Cha La Cha Cha!
In the desert where the bright red sun descends,
there a large monster lived a carefree life.
One morning when he woke up,
he heard the sound of a caravan far away.
I want to see the sea!
A monster has a heart, too.
Go to a land with love and the sea.
in a land with love and the sea.
Mai-chan, let us go home together!
Can I stop by a fire hydrant?
Now, now, that is no place for a school girl to go!
Do you want to stop by Daiku Coffee?
They changed the system quite a bit in there,
so it may be a bit difficult for you, Mai-chan.
But I can teach you all about it.
Well, that is true and all,
but that is beyond the intended purpose or fashion!
That is way over the top.
Mai-chan, from left to right, everything is just messed up!
But I guess that is just Mai-chan's way.
What should I do for today's menu?
I heard green onions were on sale, so maybe something with that?
But Professor does not like green onions.
It is a good thing this is a well-mannered crow.
That is because it is a crow.
I am honoured to receive your praise.
I wonder if it will drink strawberry milk.
It would be cute if it did!
Well, it was the natural thing to do.
Oh, Sakamoto-san, where is your scarf?
I cannot tell what he is saying without his scarf.
It seems that he wants my scarf.
Professor, did you put Sakamoto-san's scarf on the crow?
Oh my, how terrible of me.
Well, if that is so, then I feel bad for Sakamoto-san.
I will go make another one!
That is not a scarf at all!
By the way, Professor, what kinds of abilities does Biscuit 1 have?
That is a very good question, Crow.
Professor, you should get on with making a scarf for Sakamoto-san.
After all, there is still the left hand!
I am going to kill these guys.
My, I had a wonderful day today.
I might have been too mean.
Please give this scarf back to Sakamoto-san.
Even if it was just for a short while,
I was happy to be able to speak the words of a human.
I hope we will be able to meet again.
Well then, I bid you good day.
Yesterday, I dug a trap behind the gymnasium.
It is filled with Super Glue.
I will lure her there with this letter and trap her.
I shall capture you today, Shinonome Nano.
I cannot believe that Sakurai Makoto was Sakurai-sensei's brother.
I should find a way to get information about Sakurai-sensei from him.
Oh, right: you play Go Soccer?
I am just your senior as a Go Soccer player!
I may not look like it, but I was actually the MVP in high school!
Sensei, our Go Soccer club does not have an advisor.
If you become our advisor, I would completely assist you with my sister!
Like I said, it is not like I like her or anything...
If you do not become our advisor, I will tell my sister that you like her.
Being an advisor seems like a lot of work.
I have got to go after him!
Takanojou-kun is stuck in a hole behind the gymnasium!
I need you to come immediately.
Yeah, it could be a hole in one!
Also, his hair has come off!
I think it is more important to prevent someone from revealing another's private affairs...
Because that is what it means to be a teacher!
Also, I am waiting for you to become our advisor!
That is what it means to be a teacher.
I guess I got a little ahead of myself.
I feel bad about cutting his hair.
I guess I will go save him.
He probably has no idea that I am the culprit.
Today, I definitely will not respond!
and I am always responding to it!
At this rate, it will be an endless loop of jokes and responses!
We are supposed to be pure enough to put flowers to shame!
I cannot even have a normal conversation like a high school girl.
From now on, I am not going to respond to anything!
My resolve is harder than diamond.
Unlike the other days, today is strong!
But I will not give in!
All right, now is the time to engage in some flowery girls' talk.
Hey, Mai-chan, did you watch Muscle Elegy yesterday?
It is like she is waiting for me to respond!
You have got two pairs of glasses on!
The response that only I can make!
Yeah, I heard Nakamura, the science teacher, collapsed again.
Oh, I wonder if she is all right.
Why did she say the same thing twice?!
All right, I will begin the lesson.
Silence surrounded the mountain as it began getting dark.
A natural calamity struck us from behind.
From the place where our journey began...
The fact that she is actually reading it means...
If she is actually reading it, then it means...
I will go stand in the hall!
If you do not sleep in your futon, you will catch a cold.
Sakamoto-san, you should go to your bed, too.
In the end, she will bring it along.
I am the three of spades!
I may be the weakest in Daifugou,
but if there is a reversion, I suddenly become the strongest!
If you are a man, you have to aim for that!
